Information.Name: dynobjectview
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, dialog_2, container, tablecell, form, accordeon, smartfolderdata

Attribute.Name: css

Language.Sentence: Order of rendering the object on the page. By default the value of hierarchy is 0, that means, that the object will be rendered in the order it is written in the XML-file of the VDOM application.

Position in visual hierarchy of objects. If you have several objects in one container situated on each other, the z-index indicates the order of their displaying. The larger z-index is, the upper the object lies.
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels.
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels.
Width of the object in pixels.
Height of the object in pixels.
The description of objects list in JSON format inside the Object View object.
The name of the CSS class.
as a replacement for dynamicloading. now dynamicloading is not use.

The mode of selecting the rows.

Action.SourceCode: var idlist = eval(idlist); $("#" + this.domCont.id).dynamicObjectView("markAsLoading", idlist, start, length);
var idlist = eval(idlist); $("#" + this.domCont.id).dynamicObjectView("removeItems", idlist, start, length, raiseEvent);
var idlist = eval(idlist); $("#" + this.domCont.id).dynamicObjectView("markAsSelected", idlist, start, length, raiseEvent);
var idlist = eval(idlist); $("#" + this.domCont.id).dynamicObjectView("toogleSelection", idlist, start, length, raiseEvent);
var idlist = eval(idlist); $("#" + this.domCont.id).dynamicObjectView("unmarkAsLoading", idlist, start, length);
var idlist = eval(idlist); $("#" + this.domCont.id).dynamicObjectView("unmarkAsSelected", idlist, start, length, raiseEvent);
